description:
In the year 2205, the past becomes threatened by the historical revisionists who seek to change it. Protecting history becomes the task of a boisterous band of swords that are brought to life, including the glamorous Kashu Kiyomitsu and the kindly Yamatonokami Yasusada. Beyond their battles, these legendary swords from different eras lead charming daily lives.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

node.description: Nitro Plus, sometimes written as Nitro+, is a Japanese visual novel developer that has developed a number of visual novels, including eroge. They have been collaborating with TYPE-MOON (another developer) to create the light novel series, Fate/Zero.  They also have a branch of the company called Nitro+Chiral, which focuses on BL visual novels. Their works usually have dark themes such as reanimation of the dead and murder.

**Height:** 176 cm (5'9)

[Website](https://www.toshikimasuda.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ToshikiMasuda38) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/toshi.m38/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx47ourWgyHf3iAl77MYY0g/featured)

__Non-Anime Roles:__

- Rover - Wuthering Waves (VG)
- Masayoshi Tanimura - Yakuza 4 Remastered

**Hobbies:** Arcade games, reading

[Website](http://www.mausu.net/talent/tpdb_view.cgi?UID=166) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mitsuhiroichiki) | [__Blog__](http://ameblo.jp/garoumow/)

He is married to fellow voice actress [Nana Inoue](https://anilist.co/staff/100578/Nana-Inoue).

__Non-anime roles:__~!
Amagase Shou in "BareSuta Third" (Drama CD) (Japanese)
Astronomy Telescope Guy in "Nazowakukan -Oto No Mani Mani-" (Nintendo 3DS Mystery Adventure Game) (Japanese)
Donnel in "Fire Emblem Heroes" (VG) (Japanese)

Hinata in "Fire Emblem Heroes" (VG) (Japanese)
Hisame in "Fire Emblem Fates" (VG) (Japanese)

Natsuhiko Tenkawa in "Root Double -Before Crime * After Days-" (Visual novel) (Japanese)
Yamatonokami Yasusada in "Touken Ranbu" (browser game) (Japanese)!~

Seiichirou Yamashita is a voice actor affiliated with Office Osawa.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/KuvoreGordon) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtrcEJF5tY60gzD1X16X9cA)

__Yuuki Tai__  is a theatre and voice actor from Tokyo, Japan, formerly affiliated with Genki Project.
Uses the name __Kakeru Shiroki__ (城樹翔) for adult works.

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).
